page.title: 10Richards Wednesday In School
page.content: My typical Wednesday at School would start with a vigourous session of swimming, in the school pool, 10 metres long, 6-7 metres wide. The session would be supervised by our brilliant teacher Mrs. Albert. We have two groups, one swims for 30mins while the others work in the class on Stride Ahead, or various other activities. With chattering teeth, we emerge from the pool, and then have Mixed Lessons from 9.30 to Assembly. In June , Mrs. Albert introduced 'Blue Cards'. We could work at our own pace, as long as we got the week's work done. After Lunch we have USSR! (Really Silent Reading). Next is our Music lesson. I help get out the equipment, while we are taught Tempos and Rhythms from books and sheets. Lastly, Topic Work, where we draw graphs and measure bits and pieces for Mr. Want.
